title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 48 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 48 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的诗歌）耶和华本为大，在我们神的城中，在他的圣山上，该受大赞美。

lineList.en: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
lineList.cn: 锡安山，大君王的城，在北面居高华美，为全地所喜悦。

lineList.en: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
lineList.cn: 神在其宫中自显为避难所。

lineList.en: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
lineList.cn: 看哪，众王会合，一同经过。

lineList.en: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.
lineList.cn: 他们见了这城，就惊奇丧胆，急忙逃跑。

lineList.en: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
lineList.cn: 他们在那里被战兢疼痛抓住，好像产难的妇人一样。

lineList.en: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你用东风打破他施的船只。

lineList.en: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
lineList.cn: 我们在万君之耶和华的城中，就是我们神的城中，所看见的，正如我们所听见的。神必坚立这城，直到永远。（细拉）。

lineList.en: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
lineList.cn: 神阿，我们在你的殿中，想念你的慈爱。

lineList.en: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你受的赞美，正与你的名相称，直到地极。你的右手满了公义。

lineList.en: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.
lineList.cn: 因你的判断，锡安山应当欢喜，犹大的城邑，应当快乐。（城邑原文作女子）

lineList.en: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.
lineList.cn: 你们当周游锡安，四围旋绕，数点城楼，

lineList.en: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.
lineList.cn: 细看他的外郭，察看他的宫殿，为要传说到后代。

lineList.en: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
lineList.cn: 因为这神永永远远为我们的神。他必作我们引路的，直到死时。
